summary: My latest sword mod, the ivory blade!
descriptionHtml:
Discover the secret art of Ivory crafting with this new mod!
This mod will add one new sword to the game, which currently has the same stats as the daedric sword. 

To craft this weapon you will NEED the arcane smithing perk, and also have unlocked the Ivory knowledge spell learned from a book I hid somewhere in blackreach. For now this is all It is, since our internet is down at home. 

However I might add a couple more things later, including:
- Other Ivory weapons, bows, daggers, axes, hopefully every type of weapon
- Ivory tab in the crafting menu
- Perhaps a quest following the story I wrote for this mod

UPDATE: Thanks to Brodual for featuring this in his show! 
[youtube]EW8-hmof2ug[/youtube]

Endorse if you like my work! :D
author: anotherrandomperson
